name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Electro Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytitle: Lightning and Rain: Thunder Summoner's Crown
storytext: "The song pierced the storm's low hum, ripped through the clouds, and bestowed upon it, light."
